item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar and restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: English Cellar Alehouse on Angell Street, just off Thayer. Rhode Island's only pub with an English accent! Monday night is free billiards and $.35 wings!

http://www.englishcel...

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Emily is hosting - look at her picture, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - English Cellar Alehouse!
